notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: J.H., M.A. and A.B. conceived the study. J.H., B.B., M.R. and L.S. conducted the field analysis (pXRF). MA collected spall flake samples (for SEMâ€“EDS, Synch PD). H.E.A.B. conducted Synchrotron Powder Diffraction, pattern identification and co-interpretation of mineralogy with J.H. J.H. conducted SEM analyses. A.A., R.L., B.H., L.M.A. and I.M.G. collected rock art monitoring data drawn on for the study, including accounts of rapid alteration to the rock art in recent decades from local site custodians. J.H. drafted the manuscript with input from A.B. and M.A., and additional data from A.A.O. All authors edited and approved the manuscript.
